Sentencas: Ferritic stainless steel (FSS) is commonly used for interconnects in planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of coated and preoxidized ferritic steel in single and dual atmosphere exposures at 800 °C

Sentencas: Interconnects separate and connect individual cells into a stack and are simultaneously subjected to air on the cathode side and fuel on the anode side, creating a dual atmosphere exposure.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of coated and preoxidized ferritic steel in single and dual atmosphere exposures at 800 °C

Sentencas: In this study, the surface morphology and chemistry of CoMn coated FSS (Crofer 22APU) samples (with and without pre-oxidation for 100 h in 800 degrees C laboratory air) were analyzed as a function of exposure to single atmosphere (moist air) and dual atmosphere environments (moist air/moist hydrogen) for 200 h at 800 degrees C. Thin film (similar to 2 mu m)
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of coated and preoxidized ferritic steel in single and dual atmosphere exposures at 800 °C

Sentencas: CoMn coatings were deposited via magnetron sputtering on as-received and pre-oxidized samples.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of coated and preoxidized ferritic steel in single and dual atmosphere exposures at 800 °C

Sentencas: Pre-oxidation significantly inhibited outward iron transport from the FSS to the surface and reduced overall surface oxide layer thickness both for uncoated and CoMn coated samples.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of coated and preoxidized ferritic steel in single and dual atmosphere exposures at 800 °C

Sentencas: The observed oxidation behavior and surface layer evolution in both single and dual atmosphere are presented and correlated with possible transport mechanisms.
Titulo: Oxidation behavior of coated and preoxidized ferritic steel in single and dual atmosphere exposures at 800 °C
